Name: Name
422: Node with these name / ip / port is already exists
401: That node doesn't exist. Try to choose another node
501: The server doesn't response. Try to refresh the page
port error: Port should be an integer between 0 and 65535
ipAddress error: IP address should match the pattern
delete empty error: This node does not exist or it has been deleted before
default error: Something went wrong. Try one more time!
